couscous.name: Moroccan Seven Vegetable Couscous
couscous.description: A recipe for classic Moroccan seven vegetable couscous.
ingredients: 2 medium tomatoes skin removed and chopped
5-10 springs each parsley and cilantro - tied together
1 sweet potato cleaned and cut into similar size pieces as the squash
1 small eggplant, ends removed and cut into quarters

couscous.name: Lamb and Vegetable Couscous
couscous.description: One of the most traditional couscous recipes is lamb and vegetable couscous. While there might be a tendency to make the meat the star of this dish itâ€™s really just an added element. Break out the produce and get cooking!
ingredients: 1/2 - 1 lb of lamb - any cut works
1/2 squash (your choice butternut or acorn work best)
spices_addons: 1 tsp ginger (fresh if you have it)
small bunch of flat-leaf parsley, wrapped in twine
